entry.title: Stanislaus Al Dente - Ultra Premium Pasta Sauce - 6 x 100 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Stanislaus Al Dente
Type: FOOD
Price: 59.99

Utilize the convenience of ready-to-serve pasta sauce without compromising a fresh, homemade taste!

This pasta sauce is perfect for virtually any pasta dish, as well as your delicious chicken or eggplant parmesans. Packed from fresh tomatoes, extra-virgin olive oil, caramelized onions and a subtle blend of seasonings, this sauce provides the wholesome, real Italian flavor your customers crave. With the belief that quality products create quality customers, you can always rest assured you are serving the best.

Unbeatable Flavor

The tomatoes used to create this sauce experience minimal exposure to flavor-damaging heat to maximize the sauce's flavor profile. Plus, the tomatoes are packed fresh, and not from concentrate for maximum preservation of original flavor.

Convenient Bulk Can

Not only does this sauce taste great, but it provides the best in a convenience-ready bulk can, so there's no need to expend kitchen prep time creating pasta sauce from scratch. Provide ample amounts of delicious sauce to your guests!
